<entry name="Academy0Description" value=""The aim of military training is not just to prepare men for battle, but to make them long for it."
-- Louis Simpson
The Training Facility provides our troops with thorough training in the use of all available military technologies. By the end of this boot camp, we guarantee every soldier is aching for war."/> <entry name="Academy0Properties" value="Building

<entry name="Credits0Description" value="A stock exchange provides an organized market for purchasing and selling of securities with well-defined rules and regulations. This is indispensable for the smooth and orderly functioning of the corporate sector in a free market economy.
A stock exchange need not be merely a hive of speculation or a gambling den. It should sometimes also act as a place for safe and profitable investment."/> <entry name="Credits0Properties" value="Building
+25% credits from taxes
+2 credits"/>
<entry name="Credits1Properties" value="Building
+50% credits from taxes
+2 credits"/>
<entry name="Credits2Description" value=""No complaint is more common than that of a scarcity of money."
-- Adam Smith
The injection of credits into the market can help rectify minor problems, support and boost perennial projects, and save small-scale industry from bankruptcy. Once the colony starts making its own money, nothing can stand in the way of its development. Except perhaps a deflationary bubble."/> <entry name="Credits2Properties" value="Building
+100% credits from taxes
+2 credits"/>
<entry name="Defense0Description" value="While constructing static fortifications to block passages and provide a military advantage is a priceless defensive boon, it has always suffered from the lack of instantaneous deployment and adaptability.
Adaptive bunker walls can be deployed immediately after a threat is identified and will form a complex of barricades, defiles and bunkers. The dynamic nature of the structure allows it to be easily repacked after the threat has passed to provide free passage and keep the economic impact as low as possible."/> <entry name="Defense0Properties" value="Building
+50% power for defending units
+100% power vs operations"/>
<entry name="Defense1Properties" value="Building
+100% power for defending units
+200% power vs operations"/>
<entry name="Defense2Properties" value="Building

+400% power vs operations"/>

<entry name="Food1Description" value=""It is our most sacred duty, as children of Gaia, to not sully the soil or air she so generously grants us, any more than we truly need, and only then in a most cautious manner."
-- First Gardinier Elora, Nomination Speech
Suspending plants in the air inside support structures allows for precise growth regulation. Oxygen and other nutrients come in contact directly with the plant's roots, fully bypassing the inefficiencies of an aggregate medium."/> <entry name="Food1Properties" value="Building
+50% food from farmers
+2 food"/>
<entry name="Food2Description" value="Growing plants seems inefficient at this point, since we have the technology to simply replicate food.
A solar-powered replicator works by rearranging subatomic particles, which are abundant everywhere in the universe, to form molecules and arrange those molecules to form objects. Since matter patterns are stored at a molecular level it is only possible to replicate objects with simple quantum structures, such as food.
Some Luddites still refuse to eat replicated food, instead opting for the lengthy process of growing and preparing a meal like in the old times."/> <entry name="Food2Properties" value="Building
+100% food from farmers
+2 food"/>
<entry name="Growth0Properties" value="Building
+10% growth
+1 growth"/>
<entry name="Growth1Properties" value="Building
+20% growth
+1 growth"/>
<entry name="Growth2Description" value="Until now, using nanotech to automatically increase our virtual population density has created breakouts of the dreaded Grey Goo -- self-replicating personalities, like tumours in the Matrix. HNS devices act as white blood cells or police in the system, hunting down incipient Goo.
This advancement allows us to use nanotech more freely and hugely expands synapse growth in our dominant post-physical population."/> <entry name="Growth2Properties" value="Building
+40% growth
+1 growth"/>
<entry name="HeadquartersDescription" value="The headquarters symbolizes the capital of your empire and a center of civilization. Not only will your troops fight with an iron will to hold them, they also provide some basic resources.
You can only have one headquarters - building another will relocate the headquarters to the new city.
Nullus est instar domus."/> <entry name="HeadquartersProperties" value="Building
One per empire
+50% power for defending units
+2 food
+2 minerals
+2 production
+2 research"/>

+25% minerals from miners
+2 minerals"/>
<entry name="Minerals1Description" value="The drone excavation center allows each miner to supervise a number of drones at his mineral site. The use of these robotic programmed drones has proven to be invaluable thanks to their cutting-edge sensory devices and excavation lasers.
There has only been one accident so far, where a drone undergoing maintenance detected the human supervisor as the mining target, with fatal results. After refined the unfortunate individual, the drone continued operation following standard mining protocols."/> <entry name="Minerals1Properties" value="Building
+50% minerals from miners
+2 minerals"/>
<entry name="Minerals2Properties" value="Building
+100% minerals from miners
+2 minerals"/>
<entry name="Morale0Description" value=""The Information Ministry humbly presents its valued citizens with the latest in entertainment technology! Heroes so real they blur the line between truth and fantasy, reality and imagination! "
-- Prime Minister Yun Xi
After years of hypersleep and inactivity, our people long for distraction and entertainment to stimulate their senses. Holographic 3D projections are the next step towards a virtual reality that promises an exciting experience for the whole family."/> <entry name="Morale0Properties" value="Building
+4 morale"/>
<entry name="Morale1Description" value=""The truth is that we can learn to condition our minds, bodies, and emotions to link pain or pleasure to whatever we choose. By changing what we link pain and pleasure to, we will instantly change our behaviors."
-- Anthony Robbins
Through neural microsurgery and operant conditioning, all provided by the Emotion Regulation Center, the colonists can subtly alter their dominant alpha waves in case of emotional distress, substantially improving their well-being amidst the sometimes-depressing environment of Pandora."/> <entry name="Morale1Properties" value="Building
+8 morale"/>
<entry name="Morale2Description" value=""Praised be the Lords, for they have granted us the most complete of communions, the most beautiful Eucharist of all. Let us praise the Lords as one body, one mind, united in the one belief!"
-- Lady Lilith Vermillion, The Path to Salvation
Study of Xenomorph hives has allowed our colony to emulate the Bugs' collective mind through artificial means, while still retaining the individuality we so prize. This allows the colonists to fully realize their empathy, eliminating most social discontent."/> <entry name="Morale2Properties" value="Building
+16 morale"/>
<entry name="NukeBuildingProperties" value="Building
Provides a nuke operation
8 turn cooldown"/>
<entry name="Pollution0Description" value="Old Earth was in a grim state. With large parts of the ozone layer destroyed as well as the landscape scarred by factional warfare and nuclear waste, our ancestors gathered in a handful of mega cities housing billions of people, trying to escape from an increasingly harsh environment.
Many scientists and ecologists rightfully advocate that such a course of events should not be repeated, and these newly-discovered automated recycling technologies are a step in the right direction."/> <entry name="Pollution0Properties" value="Building
-4 pollution"/>
<entry name="Pollution1Properties" value="Building
-8 pollution"/>
<entry name="Pollution2Description" value=""It is our most sacred duty to give back to this earth whenever, wherever we can, so as to lay a solid, sane foundation for her future children."
-- First Gardinier Elora, Nomination Speech
Why repair what you can recreate? The Atmotron processes the atmospherical data of a given zone for a while, then reproduces and enhances it by various means ranging from electrolysis to ionization, efficiently suppressing most pollution problems in the area."/> <entry name="Pollution2Properties" value="Building
-16 pollution"/>
<entry name="Population0Description" value=""It is no secret that I consider modularization to be heavily underused in the field of architecture. To expand living space by shifting walls and layering floors becomes a trivial endeavor when your building is constructed in modular fashion."
-- Dejazmach Wendo, Modular Architecture
Rather than build housing in an inefficient, inclination-driven way, better space occupation can be achieved by building adaptive, highly reconfigurable accommodations. Named after their inventor Dejazmach Wendo, those allow us to shelter more colonists in a given area rather than expand indefinitely and erratically."/> <entry name="Population0Properties" value="Building
+4 habitat"/>
<entry name="Population1Properties" value="Building
+8 habitat"/>
<entry name="Population2Description" value=""Personally, I would be delighted if there were a life after death, especially if it permitted me to continue to learn about this world and others, if it gave me a chance to discover how history turns out."
-- Carl Sagan
Once a colonist becomes too old to be of any direct use to the colony, his experience and personality can be burned onto a chip. Those are then linked to a global network feeding their expertise to the various digital structures of the colony, allowing the retired to keep participating in its development. This spares their relatives the grief of their loss, while the bodies may be discarded, leaving room for younger, healthier colonists."/> <entry name="Population2Properties" value="Building
+16 habitat"/>
